import React, { useMemo, useState } from "react"; import styles from "./reserveBook.module.css"; import Navbar from "../../components/navbar/Navbar"; import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; import Footer from "../../components/footer/Footer"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router"; function ReserveBookPage() { const location = useLocation(); const hotel = location.state; console.log(hotel); const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: "selection", }, ]); // Get currentUser information: const curUser = useMemo( () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("currentUser")), [] ); return (

{hotel.name}

{hotel.desc}

${hotel.cheapestPrice} {" "} (1 night)
{/* Form */}
{/* date picker */}

Date

setDate([item.selection])} moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={date} className={styles.date} minDate={new Date()} />

Reserve Information

{/* Bottom */}

Select Rooms

Lorem ipsum dolor sit.

Pay nothing until tomorrow

Max People: 2
$350
{/* Total Bill */}
Total Bill : $700
{/* Payment */}
); } export default ReserveBookPage;
